sentence: There must be exceptions in the case of rape, incest and danger to the life of the mother.? Wisconsin state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski, a Democrat running in the competitive primary to challenge GOP Ron Johnson, said she joined the crowd outside the Supreme Court on Monday night, collecting personal stories from abortion rights advocates.
author:
Mary Ellen McIntire
Stephanie Akin
title: Democrats see midterm election boost from abortion ruling leak

sentence: Wisconsin state treasurer Sarah Godlewski, who's running to challenge GOP Sen. Ron Johnson, traveled to the Supreme Court to shoot what appears to be the first Senate campaign ad since the news broke.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Overturning Roe v. Wade may not change 'basic contours' of election that favors GOP: Analysts
